Name: Feng Slaughter
Trait: I would rather make a new friend than a new enemy.
Ideal: Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy. (Evil)
Bond: Something important was taken from me, and I aim to steal it back.
Flaw: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.

Equipment: ['Rapier', "Entertainer's Pack", 'Pan Flute', 'Leather Armor', 'Dagger', 'Crowbar', 'Set of Dark Common Clothes with a Hood', '15 GP']

Name: Leia Biggs
Trait: I have a strong sense of fair play and always try to find the most equitable solution to arguments.
Ideal: Sincerity. There's no good in pretending to be something I'm not. (Neutral)
Bond: My tools are symbols of my past life, and I carry them so that I will never forget my roots.
Flaw: The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed.
Features: ['Favored Enemy', 'Natural Explorer', 'Deft Explorer (Optional)', 'Favored Foe (Optional)', 'Fighting Style', 'Spellcasting', 'Spellcasting Focus (Optional)', 'Primeval Awareness', 'Ranger Conclave', 'Primal Awareness (Optional)', 'Ability Score Improvement', 'Martial Versatility (Optional)', 'Extra Attack']
Equipment: ['Scale Mail', '2 Shortswords', "Explorer's Pack", 'Longbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', "Set of Traveler's Clothes", '15 GP']

Name: Horgus Carnavon
Trait: To me, a tavern brawl is a nice way to get to know a new city.
Ideal: Respect. The thing that keeps a ship together is mutual respect between captain and crew. (Good)
Bond: Ruthless pirates murdered my captain and crewmates, plundered our ship, and left me to die. Vengeance will be mine.
Flaw: Once someone questions my courage, I never back down no matter how dangerous the situation.
Equipment: ['Leather Armor', 'Longbow', '20 Arrows', 'Net', 'Shield', 'Light Crossbow', '20 Bolts', "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Belaying Pin', '50 ft. Silk Rope', 'Lucky Charm', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']

Name: Harold Marks
Trait: I never pass up a friendly wager.
Ideal: Mastery. I'm a predator, and the other ships on the sea are my prey. (Evil)
Bond: I'm loyal to my captain first, everything else second.
Flaw: Once I start drinking, it's hard for me to stop.
Equipment: ['Rapier', 'Shortbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', "Explorer's Pack", 'Leather Armor', '2 Daggers', "Thieves' Tools", 'Belaying Pin', '50 ft. Silk Rope', 'Lucky Charm', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']
Race Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

Name: Dalyla Hopper
Trait: I'm used to helping out those who aren't as smart as I am, and I patiently explain anything and everything to others.
Ideal: Logic. Emotions must not cloud our logical thinking. (Lawful)
Bond: My life's work is a series of tomes related to a specific field of lore.
Flaw: Most people scream and run when they see a demon. I stop and take notes on its anatomy.
Equipment: ['Shortsword', 'Shortbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', "Explorer's Pack", 'Leather Armor', '2 Daggers', "Thieves' Tools", 'Bottle of Ink', 'Quill', 'Small Knife', 'Letter from a Dead Colleague with an Unanswered Question', 'Set of Common Clothes', '10 GP']

Name: Abyl Moler
Specialty: A written story, song, poem, or secret
Trait: I'm confident in my own abilities and do what I can to instill confidence in others.
Ideal: Fairness. No one should get preferential treatment before the law, and no one is above the law. (Lawful)
Bond: My tools are symbols of my past life, and I carry them so that I will never forget my roots.
Flaw: I have trouble trusting in my allies.
Equipment: ['Shortsword', 'Shortbow', '20 Arrows', 'Quiver', "Dungeoneer's Pack", 'Leather Armor', '2 Daggers', "Thieves' Tools", "Set of Traveler's Clothes", '15 GP']

Name: Cameryn Dice
Specialty: Zan's Comin' Back. This hopeful Tal'Dorei folk song declares the inevitable return of a just ruler. Use it to seek out potential allies.
Trait: When I don't have a reason to smile, I'm miserable.
Ideal: Vigilance. A free people must be carefully taught, lest they be misled. (Neutral)
Bond: The elite in their ivory towers don't understand how we suffer. I intend to show them.
Flaw: I can't afford to trust anyone. Not. Anyone.

Name: Andrea Henkeeper
Trait: I'll settle for nothing less than perfection.
Ideal: Greed. I'm only in it for the money and fame. (Evil)
Bond: I would do anything for the other members of my old troupe.
Flaw: A scandal prevents me from ever going home again. That kind of trouble seems to follow me around.

Name: Alysea Palewine
Trait: I am always the first into the fray.
Ideal: Justice. Achieving justice requires establishing fair, equitable, and compassionate relationships within a community. (Good)
Bond: I ran with the Rakdos in my youth, and I'm striving to atone for my past misdeeds.
Flaw: I trust the chain of command more than anything - more even than my closest friends.

Name: Tuck Chaplin
Trait: I don't pay attention to the risks in a situation. Never tell me the odds.
Ideal: Greed. I will do whatever it takes to become wealthy. (Evil)
Bond: Someone I loved died because of a mistake I made. That will never happen again.
Flaw: When I see something valuable, I can't think about anything but how to steal it.

Race Source: Eberron: Rising from the Last War

Name: Ivano Millett
Trait: I have always gotten ahead by giving, why change now?
Ideal: Hope. I am guided by a higher power and I trust that everything will be right in the end. (Good)
Bond: There was someone I cared about in Phlan. I will find out what happened to them.
Flaw: When something goes wrong, it's never my fault.
